item.title: Add Pumble
item.description: https://pumble.com - Free team chat app. Unlimited users and message history, free forever.

item.title: Add Clockify
item.description: https://clockify.me - Time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects. Unlimited users, free forever.

item.title: Add Plaky
item.description: https://plaky.com) - Free task management (kanban - Free task management (kanban) software without any limits. Unlimited users, unlimited projects, free forever.

item.title: Add Buildkite under CI/CD
item.description:

https://buildkite.com/test-analytics - â€” Get more out of your test suites, works with any CI platform. Free developer tier includes 100k test executions/month, with more free inclusions for open source projects.

item.title: added soos
item.description: https://soos.io - Free, unlimited SCA scans for open source projects. Detect and fix security threats before release. Protect your projects with a simple and effective solution.

item.title: Add pricing information for todoist
item.description: https://todoist.com/ - Collaborative and individual task management. Free plan has: 5 active projects, 5 users in project, file uploading up to 5MB, 3 filters, 1 week activity history.

item.title: Remove zentao - no free SaaS, only self-hosted
Add pricing information for kanbantool
item.description: https://kanbantool.com/ - Kanban board-based project management. Free plan has 2 boards, 2 users, without atachments or files.

item.title: Add pricing information for taskade
item.description: https://www.taskade.com/ - Real-time collaborative task lists and outlines for teams. Free plan has: 1 workspace with unlimited tasks and projects; 1GB file storage; 1 week project history; 5 attendees per video meeting.

item.title: Add pricing information to easyretro
item.description: https://www.easyretro.io/ - Simple and intuitive sprint retrospective tool. Free plan has 3 public boards and 1 survey per board per month.

item.title: Add pricing information for bitrix24
item.description: https://www.bitrix24.com/ - Intranet and project management tool. Free plan has 5GB for unlimited users.

item.title: Remove vivifyscrum, because it has no free plan
add coinmarketcap
item.description: https://coinmarketcap.com/api/ - Provides cryptocurrency market data including latest crypto and fiat currency exchange rates. Free tier offers 10K call credits/month.
